document_data.name: Mladris
document_data.mainbody: '''Mladris''' was an [[elven]] [[sorceress]] of [[Cormanthyr]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Mladris was selected to protect [[Mythanthor]] by the [[Srinshee]]. While guarding his tower, she was ambushed and slain by a number of elven mages bent on slaying her charge.
